meanings.definition: The quality or state of being plush.
meanings.sent1: The plushiness of the sofa made it perfect for relaxing.
meanings.sent2: I love the plushiness of my favorite teddy bear.
meanings.sent3: The plushiness of the pillow made it so comfy, I almost fell asleep at my desk!
meanings.sent4: The plushiness of the carpet felt like walking on clouds.
meanings.sent5: The plushiness of the blanket enveloped me in warmth and coziness.

meanings.definition: Softness and comfort, as of a plush material.
meanings.sent1: The plushiness of the fabric against my skin was delightful.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the plushiness of the velvet cushions.
meanings.sent3: The plushiness of the robe made her feel like a pampered queen.
meanings.sent4: The plushiness of the mattress made it hard to get out of bed in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The plushiness of the puppy's fur was so soft to touch.

meanings.definition: A plush or luxurious appearance or feel.
meanings.sent1: The plushiness of the hotel room made it feel like a five-star resort.
meanings.sent2: The plushiness of the velvet curtains added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The plushiness of the velvet cake made it a decadent treat.
meanings.sent4: The plushiness of the velvet dress made her feel like a movie star.
meanings.sent5: The plushiness of the spa robe made her feel pampered and relaxed.
